actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the total amount paid by a self-employed taxpayer for his or her health insurance premiums will be allowed as a business deduction.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the total amount paid by a self-employed taxpayer for health insurance premiums will be allowed as a business expense deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the total amount paid by a self-employed taxpayer for his or her health insurance premiums will be allowed as a business deduction.
